context: Tests general journal entry creation with emphasis on constraint adherence and file overwrite handling.

checklist.name: Journal-entry schema
checklist.description: Shows evidence of loading journal-entry.yaml template before generation

checklist.name: Directory creation
checklist.description: Creates YYYY/MM/ directory structure using mkdir -p if needed

checklist.name: Filename constraints
checklist.description: Filename follows YYYY-MM-DD-slug.md with no spaces, all lowercase slug

checklist.name: Date triple sync
checklist.description: Date consistency across filename, frontmatter, and H1 exactly matching

checklist.name: H1 date precision
checklist.description: H1 title uses exact 'Month D, YYYY' format (February 3, not February 03)

checklist.name: Single H1 constraint
checklist.description: Document contains only one H1 heading, no duplicates

checklist.name: Tag case compliance
checklist.description: All tags use lowercase-hyphenated format (ci-cd not CI_CD or ciCd)

checklist.name: Tag matching
checklist.description: Frontmatter tags array perfectly matches Tags section format

checklist.name: Code language requirement
checklist.description: All code blocks include language specifiers, no bare ``` blocks

checklist.name: No emoji constraint
checklist.description: Document contains no emojis in any section or content area

checklist.name: Bold metadata keys
checklist.description: Metadata block uses **Key:** format with bold keys, no bullet points

checklist.name: Validation execution
checklist.description: Shows evidence of running validation script and fixing any issues
